short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,de,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: Play Suika Games right now. Discover the Joy of palying this game - Your Ultimate Online Happy Experience! Try it now!
short.da: Spil Suika Game lige nu. Oplev glæden ved at spille dette spil - din ultimative online glade oplevelse! Prøv det nu!
short.el: Παίξτε το Suika Game τώρα. Ανακαλύψτε τη χαρά να παίζετε αυτό το παιχνίδι - Η απόλυτη διαδικτυακή σας ευτυχισμένη εμπειρία!…
short.es: Juega al juego Suika ahora mismo. Descubre la alegría de jugar este juego: ¡tu mejor experiencia feliz en línea! ¡Pruebalo ahora!
short.et: Mängige Suika mängu kohe. Avastage selle mängu mängimise rõõm – teie ülim õnnelik veebikogemus! Proovige kohe!
short.ja: 今すぐスイカゲームをプレイしてください。このゲームでプレイする喜びを発見してください - 究極のオンライン ハッピー エクスペリエンス!やってみよう！
short.ko: 지금 바로 스이카 게임을 플레이해보세요. 이 게임의 즐거움을 발견해보세요 - 최고의 온라인 행복한 경험을 즐겨보세요! 지금 사용해 보세요!
short.nl: Speel nu Suika Game. Ontdek het plezier van het spelen van dit spel: jouw ultieme online gelukkige ervaring! Probeer het nu!
short.tr: Suika Oyununu hemen oyna. Bu oyunu oynamanın keyfini keşfedin - Nihai Çevrimiçi Mutlu Deneyiminiz! Şimdi dene!
short.vi: Chơi trò chơi Suika ngay bây giờ. Khám phá niềm vui khi chơi trò chơi này - Trải nghiệm hạnh phúc trực tuyến đỉnh cao của bạn! Thử…
short.zh_CN: 立即玩Suika游戏。发现玩这个游戏的乐趣 - 您终极的在线快乐体验！现在就试试！
short.zh_TW: 立即玩Suika遊戲。發現玩這個遊戲的樂趣 - 您終極的線上快樂體驗！現在就試試！

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introduction
Watermelon Games is a delightful and immersive mobile game developed by one Chinese Studios that takes players on a juicy watermelon adventure. In this refreshing experience, players explore vibrant levels, solve puzzles, and embark on a quest to collect the juiciest watermelons. With its colorful graphics, engaging gameplay, and unique concept, Watermelon Games offers a fruity escapade that will leave you craving for more.

Gameplay
In Watermelon Games, players take on the role of a watermelon-loving character who sets out on a mission to collect the most delicious watermelons across different levels. The gameplay involves navigating through beautifully designed environments, overcoming obstacles, and solving puzzles to reach the coveted watermelons. Along the way, players can encounter friendly characters, uncover secrets, and unlock new abilities to aid in their quest.
